snippet: When a guest calls and says that the sitter canceled and can she bring her toddler to your adults-only party, what do you say? Almost all commenters agreed on this one.
abstract: When a guest calls and says that the sitter canceled and can she bring her toddler to your adults-only party, what do you say? Almost all commenters agreed on this one.
lead_paragraph: Every week, the Motherlode Parental Quandary team of experienced, expert parents (that's all of us - own it!) weighs in  on a dilemma of an ethical, social or moral nature that could only happen to a fellow parent. We offer fantastic advice, and this week's advice was unusually universal. Nearly all of us were agreed on what last week's  parent should have done - but caught off guard on the phone isn't the best time to call to mind even the clearest of solutions.

headline.main: Parental Quandary Considered: Should You Bring a Child to an Adult Party?
